nodes.text: Christopher Cerasi was an editor for LucasBooks. He edited issues 1–80 of The Official Star Wars Fact File as well as the entire line of Star Wars comics for Dark Horse Comics. He left the employ of Lucas Licensing to return to his home state of New York. In 2003, Cerasi began work as an editor in the Licensed Publishing Division of DC Comics and remained there until October 2010. He still does regular freelance work for Lucasfilm.
He has also edited titles for the films Superman Returns, Batman Begins, and The Dark Knight, as well as the TV shows Smallville and Supernatural.

Cerasi is an unabashed Carrie Fisher fan, and was even featured in the introductory Real Life Tales Of Dave Land story for an edition of Star Wars Tales (wearing Leia's gold metal slave outfit) which featured stories uniquely focusing on Princess Leia and Luke Skywalker.

He is also the author of the Star Wars Fandex Deluxe Edition, and wrote the graphic-novel adaptation of Episode III under the pseudonym Miles Lane, as well as the Star Wars Tales story "First Impressions" (as Nathan Walker) about Princess Leia's first visit to Coruscant/meeting with Emperor Palpatine.
